description.zh-CN: 一个灵活的范围滑块组件，用于在定义的范围内选择单个或多个值。包含双手柄、自定义步长、值标签和流畅的动画。支持垂直和水平方向，具有完整的键盘无障碍访问。
description.en-US: A flexible range slider component for selecting single or multiple values within defined ranges. Features dual handles, custom step sizes, value labels, and smooth animations. Supports vertical and horizontal orientations with full keyboard accessibility.

description.zh-CN: 现代的范围滑块实现，具有清晰的可视指示、流畅的动画和响应式行为。提供精确的值选择，带有有用的视觉反馈和直观的手柄操作。
description.en-US: A modern range slider implementation with clear visual indicators, smooth animations, responsive behavior, and accurate value feedback. Provides precise value selection with helpful visual feedback indicators and intuitive handle manipulation for seamless user interaction experience.

description.zh-CN: 双滑块玻璃态风格的范围滑块实现
description.en-US: Range Slider implementation in Glassmorphism Dual style

description.zh-CN: Bootstrap 价格筛选风格的范围滑块实现
description.en-US: Range Slider implementation in Bootstrap Price Filter style

description.zh-CN: Material 亮度调节风格的范围滑块实现
description.en-US: Range Slider implementation in Material Brightness style

description.zh-CN: 拟态音量调节风格的范围滑块实现
description.en-US: Range Slider implementation in Neumorphism Volume style
